description: Starburst Liquid Water Enhancer - All Pink Strawberry Pack of 3 Squeeze Bottles - With Ballard Products Hard Candy Recipe Card Starburst has tons of flavors we all know and love. Now, add the Starburst All Pink Strawberry flavor to your water whenever you want! This multi-pack comes with over 72 servings of water enhancer drops to add to bottled water on the go or for a sweet treat at home! They're also sugar free and contain no calories so you can enjoy them, guilt-free! These water enhancing drops come in convenient squeeze bottles to add to your water wherever and whenever you need it!
